original_text: But just as all the good things that the Lord your God promised concerning you have been fulfilled for you, so the Lord will bring upon you all the evil things, until he has destroyed you from off this good land that the Lord your God has given you,
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 말씀하신 모든 선한 말씀이 너희에게 임한 것 같이 여호와께서 모든 불길한 말씀도 너희에게 임하게 하사 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 주신 이 아름다운 땅에서 너희를 멸절하기까지 하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: But just as all the good things
that the Lord your God promised concerning you
so the Lord will bring upon you all the evil things,
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같이 주께서 너희에게 모든 재앙을 가져오시리라,

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God has given you,
